Changelog
=========

0.4 - 2008-09-24
----------------

- Fixed some rounding problems on cropped images.
  [cesku]

0.3 - 2008-09-22
----------------

- Added 'searchable' attribute to keywords TextField.
  [cesku]

- edit_crop template uses a scaled image now
  [cesku]

- Better schema setup in unit test.
  [cesku]

0.2 - 2008-09-19
----------------

- Initial release.
  [vds, cescu, witsch, hannosch].
